record.dc:title: 8HA3 Hixon Village Site 2HA3, Hamilton Co., Tennessee. Feature 3, Burned area containing charcoal in village deposit south of mound 1HA3. Square 15L. Direction southwest.
record.wpa:narrative: Area of disturbance at base of plow line. Contained dark disturbed soil, charcoal, stone, mussel shell and animal bone fragments. Part of this feature extended into the south wall of the trench into an area which was not excavated - thus in the above measurements the maximum width appears greather than the maximum length. (See ground plan).
record.wpa:comments: No record on file for this photograph. However, a record of Feature 3 is on file at the institution.
